The charter granted by Their Majesties King William and Queen Mary to the inhabitants of the province of the Massachusetts-Bay in New-England Charter Massachusetts. England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
[1], 15, [1], 158, [5] p.
Printed by Bartholomew Green and John Allen ... for, and sold by, Michael Perry and Benjamin Eliot, Boston in New-England : 1699.
"Acts and laws of His Majesties province of Massachusetts-Bay in New-England" (158 p.) has special t.p. Includes index.
